section.p:
The creature falls dead. You can squeeze a little of its venom from its sting - if you do so, note the
on your Adventure Sheet.

p.if:
If you were wounded in the fight, you have been
poisoned
by the scorpion man’s venom. Subtract 1 from your COMBAT, THIEVERY, and SCOUTING abilities, as you are severely weakened (although no ability can drop to zero). Note that you are poisoned - you can restore your abilities to normal if you get cured.

if.if: If you have some scorpion antidote, it will cure the poison immediately - cross the antidote off your Adventure Sheet.

section.p: You wander on until you come to a ridge. Down below, in a shallow valley, is a great mound of earth. Many burrows have been dug through it, and scorpion men are crawling in and out. This is the mound of the scorpion men - their home.

If you have the codeword Artefact, .
If not, you realize that it would simply be too dangerous to venture down there. You head back towards Venefax. .
